production.heading: Georgia Tech Resources Unavailable; plus, DiscoverE has a new style
production.message:
Direct requesting for Georgia Tech items in discoverE is currently not available. Please contact Interlibrary Loan for assistance.

You may notice some improvements to the styling of discoverE; basic functionality is the same. Please feel free to leave a comment or report a problem.
